name: Bucato!
description:
Make sure to puncture every Ok Hand to win.

Be careful not to touch the Fake Ok Hands, or you will be in trouble!

This is a game I made during Brackeys' Game Jam.

The theme was holes.

I only had 1 day to make this game, even though the jam lasted a week, so it isn't the best, hope you have fun playing it!

 :D

PS: I'm thinking of making this into an app.
